Name: Bigger Trucks
About the game: Bigger Trucks is a simulator of big cars that deliver cargo, in off-road conditions. The gameplay is based on realistic car controller and funny physics. Keep track of the condition of your car, look for the best route to bring the cargo safely, try not to lose it. Main Features Four different cars Realistic driving experience Mountain off-road Hardcore, physics-based game
